page.title: 10Working on the railway.
page.content:
At the weekend we work on the{Romney {Hythe and Dymchurch Railway.}We do all sorts of jobs like cutting back the trees and bushes along the line, picking up litter from the side of the track and emptying the bins on the stations. We fill up buckets with coal from the coal dump and give them to the drivers.
Sometimes we take a flat wagon along the track when we are levelling out the shingle in between the rails. The sleepers have to be showing and we put any extra shingle on the wagon to spread in other places. We clean and oil the points so that they move smoothly.
